name: Sammelt Bucheln! LCCN2004665850 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Sammelt Bucheln! Abstract: Poster shows a golden bottle standing next to a tree branch. Text urges people to collect beechnuts and exchange 16 kg. of them for a bottle of oil and 10 Marks. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 32 x 41 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; J.U. Engelhard, 18.; Title from item.
